title: Poll!
post: I’m doing a poll on the favorite colors of Gaehivians! If your favorite color is a shade of red or orange, click the heart emoji! If your favorite color is a shade of yellow or green, click the thumbs up emoji! If your favorite color is a shade of blue or purple, click the laughing emoji! If your favorite color is black or white, click the surprised emoji! If your favorite color is a shade of pink, brown or gray, click the sad emoji!  If your favorite color is a different color than any of the ones in the poll, click the confetti emoji!
